movies.title: Titanic
movies.description: In the year 1912 a young poor guy, Leonardo, travels by the gorgeous ship Titanic from London to New York with a big dream. On board he meets a fabulous, wealthy girl, Kate Winslet. He fells in love with her as soon as he sees this gorgeous girl. However, after a few days the ship hits an enormous iceberg and the tragedy begins to unfold. The Titanic starts sinking. The movie is very close to the real tragedy. It shows a beautiful love story with an extremely sad ending.

movies.title: The Longest Yard
movies.description: While doing time, a professional quarterback persuades a fellow convict and former coach to prepare a group of inmates for a game agains the guards.

movies.title: The Wolf of Wall Street
movies.description: Audacious, risk-taking Wall Street stockbroker Jordan Belfort amasses weath with his brash, drug-fueled attitude, drawing the FBI attention.

movies.title: The Pursuit of Happyness
movies.description: A newly single father determined to lift himself and his son out of poverty works his way up from the bottom at a stock brokerage firm.

movies.title: Django Unchained
movies.description: The 'D' in Django may be silent, but you will speak favorably about Jamie Foxx, Christoph Waltz, Leonardo DiCaprio and Kerry Washington's performances.

movies.title: A Beautiful Mind
movies.description: In a decades-spanning biopic, brilliant mathematician John Forbes Nash Jr. struggles with schizophrenia while making history in his field.

movies.title: Legends of the Fall
movies.description: The three sons of a Mointana rancher are swept up in te violence of World War I and their love for the same woman in this epic family saga.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
movies.description: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.description: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.

movies.title: Avatar
movies.description: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.
